New Records: The Braves' streak of allowing three runs or fewer in their starting pitchers' games dates back to 1893
Key Match Events: Michael Harris II's jaw-dropping home run robbery
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta manager Brian Snitker highlighted Michael Harris II's catch as unforgettable and mentioned it would be remembered for the next 24 hours
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game further damaged the Braves' division title hopes
